Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored a goal for Argentina in the 35th minute
Kevin Rodríguez scored a goal for Ecuador in the 90+1 minute
Post-Match Reflections: Emi Martinez made two saves in the penalty shootout for Argentina
Argentina advanced to the semifinals of the Copa América after winning the penalty shootout 4-2
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in a 1-1 draw after regulation time
The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas
Others: The match was covered by FOX
